from pyspark.sql import SparkSession

from opencensus.ext.azure.log_exporter import AzureLogHandler, logging
logger = logging.getLogger(__name__)
logger.setLevel(logging.DEBUG) # https://docs.python.org/3/library/logging.html#logging-levels
logger.addHandler(AzureLogHandler(connection_string=instrumentation_key))
